title: html composition line wrap
content:
Composing an email in html & text mode, I see a line wrap at 101 characters when I have the config setting at zero. Now, I realize the config value is for text only - but just who DOES compose in text only mode? This is on macOS 10.15 (yes, I need to upgrade my system) and T-bird 128.6.0 esr.

Elsewhere, I have SUGGESTED that T-bird PARTNER with LibreOffice to use a scaled-down Writer FOR composition to provide more robust writing tools for those of us who DO write!

Doesn't Outlook have something similar? IF so, Thunderbird isn't really competing.

Still, I'm curious about the wrap at 101 characters! It's clear that it wraps, when I re-size my composition window.

When I compose, I will at times include inline images and emojis and will use various fonts and bold/underline/italics along with enlarging some words. ALL these things work in LibreOffice Writer - why not in Thunderbird??
creator: phubert28

title: Read messages not displaying
content: This problem is only occurring in one folder, the others are fine. Only unread messages are displayed. I clicked and unclicked the "Show only unread messages" with no effect. I rebuilt the indexes multiple times, it shows over 1400 messages in that folder but the read messages are still not displaying. TIA
creator: dgrits

title: Automatic Account Configuration Fails
content:
Hi everyone,

This is my first public forum question. So please forgive my "newbie" status. I'm trying to add a secondary email account which is from the "Microsoft" camp. Yeah! I know, but I needed an email address that hadn't been already taken.

I'm following the steps in the FAQs and doing the steps correctly and they have worked in the past. I needed to rebuild my PC again and re-setting up my Thunderbird profiles again.

The problem I'm having is that I'm getting stuck on step 4. Granting Thunderbird Account Access. Thunderbird opens up the OAuth validation window, but it's completely blank and I've waited to see if it will come good, but nothing even after leaving it open for an hour. I have included a screenshot of the offending window.

I haven't had this issue before as they just worked. Is there something I have missed this time around? Please help.

The email domain I'm trying to add is "<<email address>>@outlook.com.au" if that helps. Thunderbird finds all the correct configuration settings and tries to ask for access, but Microsoft Server isn't responding correctly I'm gathering. Is there some workaround?

I'm using Windows 11 Pro for Workstations Version 24H2 OS build 26100.2605 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.26100.36.0 b I'm enrolled in the Insider Program (Beta Channel).

I'm using Thunderbird 128.6.0esr (64-Bit) Stock out of the wrapper setup. I hope that helps.

PS. I have no problem adding Gmail accounts using the same method, and they all work. So not sure why Outlook.com and/or Outlook.com.au accounts don't work.

Any suggestions greatly appreciated. Cheers, Simon
creator: szymonakopala

title: Add Security Exception
content:
Hi

Last week we started having issues sending emails from our Thunderbird account (Optus email). When you go to press send we see a Add Security Exception pop up. When I click View we see the Issuer Name is DigiCert Inc. When I click Get Certificate it says No Information Available. We checked the SMTP setting with Optus today and they are correct.

Description: Optus Account Server Name: smtp.optusnet.com.au Port: 25 Connection Security: STARTTLS

If anyone has any ideas that would be great. Thanks Alysha

title: Collegamento Thunderbird a casella pec
content: Buongiorno, il problema riguarda il collegamento della casella Thunderbird a un account pec. Dopo un recente aggiornamento richiesto da Aruba per l'implementazione del servizio, andato a buon fine, il collegamento con Thunderbird ha smesso di funzionare. Ora compare il messaggio: "Accesso al server pop3s.pec.aruba.it con nome utente **** non riuscito", seguito dal tasto "Inserire nuova password". Ho provato a inserire una nuova pw, senza effetto. So che il problema dovrebbe riguardare pop3, ma non so proprio dove mettere le mani. Grazie in anticipo!

creator: angelo.malfer

title: Thunerbird werkt na de laatste updates niet meer erg fijn
content:
Wat er met Thunderbird aan de hand is weet ik niet maar de laatste tijd gebeuren er dingen die ik nooit eerder heb ervaren en die erg lastig zijn.

Als ik iets uit Thunderbird kopieer en plak verschijnt er soms een oudere versie van de tekst die al eerder gewijzigd was, maar dat is dan niet de tekst die ik op dat moment kopieerde. Die oudere tekst wordt dan geplakt en wat er met de nieuwere gebeurt blijft een raadsel. Ik moet erbij zeggen dat ik veel teksten tegenwoordig maak in Google documents omdat ik dan kan dicteren (gedwongen door artrose in mijn handen), want daarvoor zijn onder Linux Mint eigenlijk geen bruikbare programma's te vinden of zo peperduur dat ik dat niet wil en ook niet kan betalen,

Het openen van mappen gaat minder makkelijk dan voorheen. Je moet echt naar het account en zorgen dat het rechts zichtbaar is en pas dan gaat de map open. Voorheen kon ik op een map, bijvoorbeeld Postvak in, in een account klikken, terwijl ik in nog het andere account bezig was, dan werd die map postvak in geopend, dat is niet meer.

Ook heb ik een grandioze hekel aan die zogenaamde “conversaties” waarbij berichten en antwoorden in een soort submap worden ondergebracht . Dat vind ik niet handig, maar het uitschakelen van “conversaties” is veel werk en werkt ook niet eens altijd helemaal goed. Waarom is er geen optie om de hele conversatie gedoe in één klap voor alles uit te schakelen? Niet alleen voor de toekomst maar ook voor het verleden wat betreft de berichten.
creator: jan.kol40

title: Body of emails not showing
content:
Hi I am using the latest version of Thunderbird.

I have an extensive archive of historic emails organised by past year which have been exported to local folders on my PC. In the past a search for old email content, for example from a specific individual, has brought up a list of all the emails in the Thunderbird account both stored in the Thunderbird folder hierarchy and also in the offline files and short extracts of these have been shown. Clicking on one of these has always recovered the full email body content for that specific email from wherever it was stored.

More recently I am now finding that the body of the emails in the offline folders are no longer shown and the only way I have been able to view that email is to note the date and then physically scroll through the offline folder for that date.

Please advise.

title: Inbox Mail Error Message "A unique identity matching the From address was not found..."
content:
In the last 24 hours all messages in the "Inbox" (new and old) no longer have a "From" email address and default to my email address, at the bottom of the screen is the following message "A unique identity matching the From address was not found. The message will be sent using the current From field and settings from identity Marcus Relton <my email address>". These emails once opened continue to be "unread", the option to typical options of a new email such as; delete are not available and they appear as if drafts. This is only occurring in the "Inbox", if mail is moved to another folder within the server folders or local folders the email appears and functions are normal. I read the following thread https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1457302, which only references updating the Inbox Flag Properties, however I do not have this option. See images of emails and properties for reference. (I have redacted my email address)

OS is Windows 11 Thunderbird is up to date as well. I have made no changes in the last 24 hours with the exception of adding a new "Tag" for email identification.

I would appreciate any help. Thanks Kristen P
